entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans have no tendency towards any alignment, however growing up in the mercantile society of Goldrise means more Goldrisers are lawful than chaotic.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goldriser Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Goldriser, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Goldriser Intuition
entries: Growing up in Goldrise, where everyone is trying to get the upper hand in deals, has made it easier for you to notice when something isn't quite right. You have advantage on Wisdom saving throws.
